content: उपाहित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Deposited, placed. {@--2@} Put on, worn. {@--3@} Connected, joined; °श्यामरुचश्च चंदनाः <ls>Ki. 8. 12</ls> showing. {@--4@} Ascribed or attributed to (आरोपित). {@--5@} Agreed upon, done by mutual agreement. --तः A fiery portent, danger or destruction from fire.
